title: Italian Minister of European Affairs
text:
The Minister of European Affairs () in <a href="Italy">Italy</a> is one of the positions in the <a href="Cabinet%20of%20Italy">Italian government</a>, head of the Department for European Politics.
The latest Minister of European Affairs is <a href="Vincenzo%20Amendola">Vincenzo Amendola</a>, of the <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28Italy%29">Democratic Party</a>, who served from 5 September 2019 until 13 February 2021. On 24 February 2020, Amendola was appointed undersecretary of state, delegated to European Affairs, by Prime Minister <a href="Mario%20Draghi">Mario Draghi</a>.
